00010 //: compute the vector normal to the plane defined by 3 vertices
00011 vgl_vector_3d<double> imesh_tri_normal(const imesh_vertex<3>& a,
00012                                        const imesh_vertex<3>& b,
00013                                        const imesh_vertex<3>& c)
00014 {
00015   vgl_vector_3d<double> ac(c[0]-a[0],c[1]-a[1],c[2]-a[2]);
00016   vgl_vector_3d<double> ab(b[0]-a[0],b[1]-a[1],b[2]-a[2]);
00017   return cross_product(ab,ac);
00018 }
